DOC.brief_summary: An observational study comparing changing from an IOP-lowering treatment to a bimatoprost-containing IOP treatment in primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG) or ocular hypertension (OHT). Visits and treatment are per normal clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing IOP-Lowering Treatments to Bimatoprost in Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of POAG or OHT Previous use of IOPlowering medication
